pages.text: Unlike your other gemstones, $(item)Amethyst$() seems to have the ability to power spell casting wands. While this ability has broken your brain more than once, the results are impressive.$(br)What more is there?

pages.title: Edified Leaves Crushing
pages.text: Hexcasters are seemingly unable to identify minerals other than Amethyst. $(italic)Clearly$() these cyan-colored leaves have the essence of $(item)Topaz$()...

pages.title: Edified Leaves Crafting
pages.text: By infusing $(item)Leaves$() with $(item)Amethyst$(), $(item)Citrine$() or $(item)Topaz$(), you get out glistening, colorful $(item)Gemstone Leaves$(), from your $(l:general/colored_trees)Colored Trees$(). Intriguingly different, yet familiar.

pages.title: Charging Amethyst
pages.text: You can charge up $(item)Amethyst Shards$() using the $(l:general/fusion_shrine)Fusion Shrine$().

pages.title: New Potion Reagent
pages.text: $(li)+15-120s duration. Sometimes more, sometimes less$(br2)As you expected, $(item)Charged Amethyst$() serves as a more potent, but also more fluctuate, $(item)Amethyst$() reagent in regards to prolonging durations.
